contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of June, 2008, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, LIMITED TO the following issue:
Did the Superior Court err in applying a “guns follows drugs” presumption to justify the pat-down of Petitioner in contravention of Commonwealth v. Zhahir, 561 Pa. 545, 751 A.2d 1153 (2000)?
